1.title: Ascension and Promise
1.keyEvent: Jesus ascends and promises the Holy Spirit

2.title: Pentecost and Baptism
2.keyEvent: Holy Spirit descends; Peter's sermon; 3000 baptized

3.title: Healing the Lame
3.keyEvent: Peter heals a lame man at the temple gate

4.title: Peter and John Arrested
4.keyEvent: Peter and John preach and are imprisoned

5.title: Ananias and Sapphira
5.keyEvent: Judgment on Ananias and Sapphira; apostles heal many

6.title: Choosing the Seven
6.keyEvent: Seven chosen to serve; Stephen performs wonders

8.title: Philip in Samaria
8.keyEvent: Philip preaches in Samaria; Ethiopian baptized

10.title: Cornelius' Vision
10.keyEvent: Peter's vision; Gentiles receive the Holy Spirit

11.title: Gentile Believers Accepted
11.keyEvent: Church accepts Gentile believers; Antioch church established

12.title: Peter's Miraculous Escape
12.keyEvent: Herod persecutes church; Peter freed from prison

13.title: Paul's First Mission
13.keyEvent: Paul and Barnabas sent; preach in Cyprus and Pisidia

14.title: Paul and Barnabas Persecuted
14.keyEvent: Paul and Barnabas heal and preach; face opposition

15.title: Council at Jerusalem
15.keyEvent: Council decides Gentiles need not follow the law

16.title: Paul's Macedonian Call
16.keyEvent: Paul's vision; Lydia baptized; Philippian jailer saved

17.title: Preaching in Thessalonica and Athens
17.keyEvent: Paul preaches in synagogues and Areopagus

18.title: Paul in Corinth
18.keyEvent: Paul ministers in Corinth; meets Aquila and Priscilla

19.title: Paul in Ephesus
19.keyEvent: Paul teaches; Ephesian revival and riot

20.title: Paul's Farewell to Ephesian Elders
20.keyEvent: Paul encourages elders; warns of coming hardships

22.title: Paul's Defense
22.keyEvent: Paul recounts his conversion to the crowd

23.title: Paul Before the Council
23.keyEvent: Paul disputes with council; plot to kill him

24.title: Paul Before Felix
24.keyEvent: Paul defends himself before Governor Felix

25.title: Paul Appeals to Caesar
25.keyEvent: Paul appeals to Caesar; Festus consults King Agrippa

26.title: Paul's Defense Before Agrippa
26.keyEvent: Paul testifies of his conversion and mission

28.title: Paul in Rome
28.keyEvent: Paul preaches in Rome under house arrest
